text:
Terrence Frederick Scammell (born January 10, 1958) is a Canadian voice director and voice actor living in Montreal, Quebec, Canada.
In a career that has spanned more than 30 years, Scammell worked on hundreds of series, live-action films, documentaries and video games for the BBC, ITV, Channel 4, Cartoon Network, Nickelodeon and production companies around the world.
Scammell received an BAFTA award for voicing the character of Darph Bobo and his directing work has been nominated for awards in U.K. and the North America.
He is married to writer and blogger Sheila Singhal and divides his time between Manchester and Birmingham. He is a member of BAFTA and the British Actors' Equity Association unions.
